forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies this morning will become partly cloudy this afternoon. High 18C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies this morning will become partly cloudy this afternoon. High 63F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Low 13C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies. Low 54F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with a steady, soaking rain later in the day. Increasing winds. High 16C. Winds SSE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, becoming a steady rain in the afternoon. Windy. High near 60F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 13C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 54F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 62F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast. Low 13C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies. Low around 55F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 18C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 63F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening then becoming cloudy with periods of rain after midnight. Low 11C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies and rain later during the night. Low 51F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday

forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 61F. Winds ESE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low around 55F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 17C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: A shower or two possible early with partly cloudy skies in the afternoon. High 61F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to considerable cloudiness and fog after midnight. Low around 10C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening. Fog developing overnight. Low 51F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 61F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally fair. Low around 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally fair. Low near 50F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
